item.description:
Elmwood Senior Center Gazebo Concert Series presents Tirebiter
Celebrate the month of June at our Concert Series. Bring your lawn chair to our beautiful Gazebo and enjoy wonderful music. All shows are held rain or shine on Tuesdays from 7:00 ? 8:30 p.m.


Bring the whole family. Rain location is the Ernest O. St. Jacques Auditorium, Elmwood Community Center, 1106 New Britain Avenue, West Hartford. For more information, call 561-8180.



Cosponsored by Harborside Healthcare, Sheehan ? Hilborn-Breen Funeral Home, Kearns & Kearns, SummerWood at University Park and At-Home Care.
item.how_to_find_us: Bring Cairs and Off and picnic food to share. Look for me

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!
